ygData.subject: Re: Reed's Bard Song Calculatr 1.09 Available
ygData.msgSnippet: Galtin, Thank you very much for pointing this out!  Apparently, I ve multiplied by 1.5 twice (actually, the fomula s were PvE and I thought they were PvP.)
ygData.messageBody:
Galtin,

Thank you very much for pointing this out! Apparently, I've
multiplied by 1.5 twice (actually, the fomula's were PvE and I
thought they were PvP.) When I remove this factor, I'm within one or
two points of the numbers reported there. However, I've some other
sources of numbers that contradict those (sigh).

Sorry all for the mistake, and expect a new version of this shortly :)

- Reed Stormwind (bard of E'ci)

--- In eqbards@egroups.com, Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4
<g4mntofcr@s...> wrote:
> Reed,
>
> The damage values for the 3 chant songs don't seem to be calculated
> correctly. Based on the info on the eqsongs website, at 50th level
with a
> Selos Drum I should be doing the following amount of damage:
>
> Level 30: 31 base damage per tick/42 per tick with Selos Drum/125
total for
> 3 ticks. Your spreadsheet lists 62 damage total for 50th level
with Selos
> drum
>
> Level 38: 48 base damage per tick/65 per tick with Selos drum/195
total for
> 3 ticks. Your spreadsheet lists 93 damage total for 50th level
with Selos
> drum.
>
> Level 46: Same as 38 except your spreadsheet list 95 damage total
for 50th
> level with Selos drum.
>
> I think the values that are listed take into account the 2/3 PvP
penalty.
> But even if you factor that in, the values don't seem to be
correct.
>
> Also the speed debuff and damage values for Chords of Cessation do
not match
> up with the values posted on eqsongs. EQsongs lists the damage as
50pts per
> tick while you list 75. Eqsongs lists the speed debuff as 16%
while you
> list 30%.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reed Stormwind [mailto:eqreed@y...]
> Sent: Wednesday, January 24, 2001 10:47 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Reed's Bard Song Calculatr 1.09 Available
>
>
> Sorry that it's a little late. I've been working on a side
project.
> If anyone knows anything about interrupts generated by a keyboard,
> please send me an e-mail (hint hint hint).
>
> Changes from the previous version are:
>
> Jothan's Provocation does not have a Dam Ab Shld and has 50% haste
> Niv's doesn't stick with song of shields.
> Song of Twilight effects were listed under song of Dawn.
> Vov (50) is 30% haste.
> Johnthan's Prov (45) is Self only, voice and it's effects are
> currently unknown.
> Melody of Ervaj is now 50.
> Celerity (36) is 20% haste.
>
> Major Change: Since there are large holes in the damage tables, our
> DoT songs (2, 18, 30, 38, 46, 48) now use formulas instead of
tables;
> these formulas are close, but not necessarily as accurate.
>
> As in the last time, right click and do a "Save Target As..." on
the
> files.
> You can get a .zip version here:
>
>
http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongCalculator/BardSpellAnalysisVe
> r1.09.excell50.xls
>
> (or, for those who have trouble, you can get the non-zipped version
> here):
>
>
http://www.geocities.com/eqreed/BardSongCalculator/BardSpellAnalysisVe
> r1.09.excell50.zip
>
> Enjoy!
>
> - Reed Stormwind (51 bard of E'ci)
>
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@r...
> with the subject submissions.
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
